에픽 레벨 기본

EPIC LEVEL BASICS

에픽 characters—those whose character 레벨 is 21st or higher—are handled slightly differently from nonepic characters. While 에픽 characters continue to receive most of the benefits of gaining 레벨, some benefits are replaced by alternative gains. A class can be advanced beyond 20th 레벨.  A ten-레벨 prestige class can progress beyond 10th 레벨, but only if the character 레벨 is already 20th or higher.  A class with fewer than ten 레벨 cannot progress beyond the maximum for that class, regardless of character 레벨.

에픽 Save 보너스: A character’s base save 보너스 does not increase after character 레벨 reaches 20th. However, the character does receive a cumulative +1 에픽 보너스 on all 내성 굴림 at every even-numbered 레벨 beyond 20th, as shown on 표: 에픽 내성굴림과 에픽 공격 보너스. Any time a feat, prestige class, or other rule refers to your base save 보너스, use the sum of your base save 보너스 and 에픽 save 보너스.

에픽 공격 보너스: Similarly, the character’s 기본 공격 보너스 does not increase after character 레벨 reaches 20th. However, the character does receive a cumulative +1 에픽 보너스 on all 공격 at every odd-numbered 레벨 beyond 20th, as shown on 표: 에픽 내성굴림과 에픽 공격 보너스. Any time a feat, prestige class, or other rule refers to your base 공격 보너스, use the sum of your 기본 공격 보너스 and 에픽 공격 보너스.

Class Skill Max Ranks: The maximum number of ranks a character can have in a class skill is equal to his or her character 레벨 +3.

Cross-Class Skill Max Ranks: For cross-직업 스킬, the maximum number of ranks is one-half the maximum for a class skill.

특기: Every character gains one feat (which may be an 에픽 or nonepic feat at the player’s choice) at every 레벨 divisible by three. These 특기 are in addition to any 보너스 특기 granted in the class 묘사.

Ability Increases: Upon gaining any 레벨 divisible by four, a character increases one of his or her 능력 점수 by 1 point. The player chooses which ability score to improve. For 멀티직업 캐릭터, 특기 and ability increases are gained according to character 레벨, not class 레벨.

Although most of the tables only show information up to a certain 레벨(often 30th), that 레벨 is by no means the limit of a character’s 성장. It can be generally assumed that any patterns on a particular table continue infinitely.

직업 특성

CLASS FEATURES

Many, but not all, 직업 특성 continue to accumulate after 20th 레벨. The following guidelines describe how the 에픽 직업 성장.

• A character’s base save 보너스 and 기본 공격 보너스 don’t increase after 20th 레벨. Use 표: 에픽 내성굴림과 에픽 공격 보너스 to determine the character’s 에픽 보너스 on 내성 굴림 and 공격.

• Characters continue to gain 히트 다이스 and skill points as normal beyond 20th 레벨.

• Generally, any class feature that uses class 레벨 as part of a mathematical formula continues to increase using the character’s class 레벨 in the formula.  Any prestige class feature that calculates a save DC using the class 레벨 should add only half the character’s class 레벨 above 10th.

• For spellcasters, 시전자 레벨 continues to increase after 20th 레벨. However, 주문 per day don’t increase after 20th 레벨. The only way to gain additional 주문 per day (other than 보너스 주문 gained from a high ability score) is to select 향상된 주문 용량 에픽 feat.

• The powers of familiars, special 탈것 소환, and fiendish servants continue to increase as their masters gain 레벨.

• Any 직업 특성 that increase or accumulate as part of a repeated pattern also continues to increase or accumulate after 20th 레벨 at the same rate.  An exception to this rule is any 보너스 feat granted as a class feature. If a character gets 보너스 특기 as part of a class feature, these do not increase with 에픽 레벨. Instead, these classes get 보너스 특기 at a different rate (described in each 에픽 class 묘사).

• In addition to 직업 특성 retained from nonepic 레벨, each class gains 보너스 feat every two, three, four, or five 레벨 after 20th. This augments each class’s progression of 직업 특성, because not all classes otherwise improve 직업 특성 after 20th 레벨. A character must select these 특기 from the list of 보너스 특기 for that class. These 보너스 특기 are in addition to the feat that every character gets every three 레벨. The character isn’t limited to selecting from the class list when selecting these 특기.

• Characters don’t gain any new 직업 특성, because there aren’t any new 직업 특성 described for these 레벨. 직업 특성 with a progression that 감속화 or stops before 20th 레벨 and features that have a limited list of options do not improve as a character gains 에픽 레벨. Likewise, 직업 특성 that are gained only at a single 레벨 do not improve.

보조 직업 추가하기

Adding a Second Class

When a single-class 에픽 character gains a 레벨, he or she may choose to increase 레벨 of his or her current class or pick up a new class at 1 레벨. The standard rules for 멀티직업 캐릭터 still apply, but 에픽 characters must keep in mind the rules for 에픽 성장. 에픽 character gains all the 1st-레벨 직업 스킬, weapon proficiency, 갑옷 숙련, 주문, and other 직업 특성 of the new class, as well as a Hit Die of the appropriate type. In addition, the character gets the usual skill points from the new class. Just as with standard multiclassing, adding the second class does not confer some of the benefits for a 1st-레벨 character, including maximum 히트 포인트 from the first Hit Die, quadruple the per-레벨 skill points, starting 장비, starting gold, or an animal companion. An 에픽 character does not gain the 기본 공격 보너스 and base save 보너스 normally gained when 보조 직업 추가하기. Instead, an 에픽 character uses 에픽 공격 보너스 and 에픽 save 보너스 progression shown on 표: 에픽 Save and 에픽 공격 보너스.
